mapper.select: SELECT cb.customer_id, cb.authority_code, cb.name, cb.email, cde.gender, cde.birthday, cde.address FROM customer_basic cb JOIN customer_detail cde ON cb.customer_id = cde.customer_id WHERE cb.customer_id = #{id}

SELECT cb.customer_id, cb.authority_code, cb.name, cb.email, cde.gender, cde.birthday, cde.address FROM customer_basic cb JOIN customer_detail cde ON cb.customer_id = cde.customer_id WHERE cb.email = #{email} AND cb.password = #{password}
